page.title: 12Lawford School
page.content: Lawford C of E school is big and square. The doors and windows are very large with a few pictures stuck on to them. It has 2 playing areas, one has netball pitches and the other larger area has a hump right in the middle of it. The school is surounded by a wire fence, there is a long drive leading to the main building. Inside the school there is a dinner hall which we also use for Gymnastics. The office and the girls and boys changing rooms lead off from the hall. There are three infant classrooms, three junior classrooms, a television room and a mobile classroom. By Claire Walsh, 12 years old.
